Class MyLocalTaskInformation

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.cs.c301_teamproject.MyLocalTaskInformation

public class MyLocalTaskInformation
extends Activity

This class is used to store taskIDs locally for both myTask and myLikes.
